long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT Auto Clicker Extension

The ChatGPT Auto Clicker Chrome extension is designed to enhance your browsing experience by automating repetitive tasks. This extension automatically clicks the "Continue" button on web pages, saving you time and effort. Whether you're navigating through pop-ups, surveys, or other frequent prompts, the ChatGPT Auto Clicker ensures a seamless and uninterrupted online experience. Easy to install and simple to use, this extension is perfect for users looking to streamline their interactions with various websites.

Features:

Automatically clicks "Continue" buttons on web pages.
Saves time by automating repetitive tasks.
Enhances browsing efficiency and user experience.
Simple installation and user-friendly interface.
